_comment: Nodes that cannot be isolated due to architectural constraints. Add entries here instead of modifying __init__.py.

nodes.ComfyUI-MultiGPU: This extension requires direct GPU process management and hooks into ComfyUI's main event loop. Running it inside PyIsolate would break GPU synchronization and create undefined behavior.
nodes.ComfyUI-Crystools: Depends on jetson-stats, which refuses to install inside sandboxed environments. Please remove the jetson-deps dependency or provide an alternate implementation before enabling isolation.
